revised_title: Obituary Notices of Fellows Deceased: Arthur Connell, Edward Joshua Cooper, Joshua Field, and Richard Fowler
tldr: This article provides obituary notices for four fellows of the Royal Society who passed away between November 30, 1862, and November 30, 1863. The individuals discussed are Arthur Connell, a chemist and professor; Edward Joshua Cooper, an amateur astronomer and observer; Joshua Field, a civil engineer and marine steam-engine expert; and Richard Fowler, a physician and medical professional.
